name: Abandoned drive-in | 廃ドライブイン
name_original: Abandoned drive-in | 廃ドライブイン
description:
The main character, Kaori, is on a date with her first boyfriend, who suggests that she go to a haunted place to test her courage.


She is told that it is a haunted place known only to those in the know.


She reluctantly agrees and heads up the mountain road to an abandoned Showa-era drive-in.


On the way to the entrance of the building, I heard a noise from the back and stopped.

I wondered if there was already a visitor in the ruins...



Game System


This is a short multi-ending story.

Number of endings
6
Extra Endings
2
Total 8 endings



The game contains elements of a walking simulator in which you move around the map while checking items.
The game is a fictional story that has nothing to do with any actual incidents or accidents.



You are welcome to distribute the game in real life.
No prior notification is required, but please include the URL of the store page in the summary section of the distribution page.
